name: Let There Be Kiosk
description:
Manage a chaotic kiosk on the side of the road using your mind-reading burger technology!

_________________________________

The busy people of cubesville love burgers, but they don't have time to stop and order them! Read their minds and construct their dream burger before they leave your sight. Watch out though, because if you can't pay your taxes then the kiosk will be shut down!

Controls:

Brain Scan - E

Pickup/Drop/Press Buttons - Left-Click

Throw - Right-click

Crouch - Shift

Options - Escape

_________________________________

Detailed Instructions:

Press E to see what burger each person wants, then build said burger using the materials in your kiosk. After completing your burger throw it at the customer who wanted it to make money.  When you run out of an ingredient that you need, press the red button to restock. Restocking will cost money. Your money is displayed on the green slider on the right side of the kiosk. Your money will slowly deplete to pay your burger-kiosk tax, and if you fail to pay this tax your kiosk will be forced to close for good.

Notes:

I still haven't made a soundtrack for this game but I plan to in the near future.

I am 15 years old, and this is only my second game jam so it might be a little buggy, but I had a whole lot of fun constructing this wacky burger building retro game and I hope you have just as much fun playing it.
